text: Juan Cifré Navas (born 26 May 1993) is a Spanish footballer who plays as a right back. ==Club career== Born in Palma, Majorca, Cifré graduated from local RCD Mallorca's youth system, and made his senior debuts while on loan at CD Llosetense in the 2012–13 campaign, in Tercera División. He returned to the Bermellones in the 2013 summer, and was assigned to the reserves also in the fourth level. Cifré made his first team debut on 24 May 2015, starting in a 2–4 away loss against Albacete Balompié for the Segunda División championship.El Albacete se salva matemáticamente a costa de un inoperante Mallorca (Albacete mathematically saves itself under the expense of a inoperative Mallorca); Marca, 24 May 2015 On 20 August he moved to another reserve team, Sporting de Gijón B in Segunda División B.El Sporting B incorpora a los defensas Garrido y Cifre (Sporting B signs defenders Garrido and Cifre); Sporting's official website, 20 August 2015 ==References== ==External links== * * *Juan Cifré at La Preferente Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Palma de Mallorca Category:Spanish footballers Category:Footballers from Mallorca Category:Association football defenders Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:RCD Mallorca B players Category:RCD Mallorca players Category:Sporting de Gijón B players Category:SD Formentera players
title: Juan Cifré
